all_text_timv: Muczynski, Robert, 1929-2010. Instrumental music. Selections Complete works for flute [electronic resource] / Muczynski. [Hong Kong] : Naxos Music Library, [2004] performed music prm rdacontent computer c rdamedia online resource cr rdacarrier Streaming audio. Title from image of compact disc cover on Web page (viewed Dec. 15, 2004). Includes program notes. Quintet for winds, op. 45 (12:02) -- Duos for flutes, op. 34 (7:17) -- Moments for flute and piano, op. 47 (11:57) -- Fragments for woodwind trio (6:38) -- Three preludes for unaccompanied flute, op. 18 (3:59) -- Movements for wind quintet, op. 16 (5:57) -- Duos for flute and clarinet (7:51) -- Sonata for flute and piano, op. 14 12:41). Alexandra Hawley, Jean-Pierre Rampal, flutes ; Robert Muczynski, piano ; Stanford Woodwind Quintet. Recorded at St. Vincent's Chapel, San Rafael, California, January 21-26, February 26, 1996. Also available as compact disc. Mode of access: World Wide Web. System requirements: MS Windows 98SE, or 2000, or XP; MS Internet Explorer 6.0, Mozilla 1.7.1, FireFox 1PR, Netscape 7.1, or Opera 7.53; and Media Player 9 or 10.
